longInfo:
Passport required. 
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of New Zealand with proof of being Cook Islanders
  or descendants of Cook Islanders must be valid on arrival. 
- Passports issued to nationals of New Zealand must be valid
  for a minimum of 7 days beyond the period of intended stay. 

Visa required, except for Nationals of New Zealand being Cook
Islanders or descendants of Cook Islanders. 
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 31 days for nationals
of New Zealand, not being a Cook Islander or descendant of a
Cook Islander.
Visa Issuance:
- Visitors wishing to stay over 31 days, can obtain an Entry
  Permit on arrival. 
Additional Information:
- Visitors travelling for touristic purposes may extend their
  stay, for periods of 31 days, up to a max. of 6 months.
- Descendants of Cook Islanders born outside the Cook Isl.
   



 Cook Isl
